subtitulo: Developer in Training (Fatec) | Python • C++ • PL/SQL • Git/GitHub • Oracle Database | Logic, Technical Support & Fluent English (TOEIC 945)
objetivo: Transitioning into tech, I’m seeking opportunities as a junior developer or technical analyst, applying my systems training, hands-on projects, and interpersonal skills to deliver scalable digital solutions.
resumo: Tech developer in transition, studying Systems Analysis and Development (FATEC-RP). Fluent in English (TOEIC 945), with experience in customer service and credit analysis. I've developed cloud-based apps using Python and Firebase REST APIs (Auth, NoSQL), integrating real-time data and cross-platform access. Hands-on experience in mobile development with Flutter/Dart, and data-driven projects involving RSA cryptography, Scikit-learn ML, and optimization models with Gurobi. Delivered computer vision solutions using OpenCV. I apply Git/GitHub and Agile methodologies to ensure collaboration and version control. Driven by empathy, autonomy, and purpose — ready to add value to impact-driven tech teams.
